snippet.title: Cuthbert in the Jungle - Commodore 64 Gameplay (Steam re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983 for the TRS-80 Colour Computer and Dragon 32, and then a year later for the Commodore 64, this simple riff on a popular home computer game of the time saw players take on the role of Cuthbert in his debut appearance, swinging through the jungle collecting treasure.

Fight your way through the jungle, collecting treasures as you go. Jump the pits, swing across the alligators while being ever mindful of the terrible creature hiding in the basement.

Part of the Cuthbert series.

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK.

Developed by MicroDeal Ltd.
Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2376930/Cuthbert_in_the_Jungle/
Also released on TRS-80 and Dragon 32.

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #retrogames #retrogaming #commodore64 #c64 #commodore #pixelgamesuk #c64games #commodore64games #micrcdeal #pixelgamesuk #cuthbertinthejungle #cuthbertson 

Fun Fact: In case you haven't figured out by now, it's a clone of Activision's classic Atari 2600 game, Pitfall. Furthermore, it's worth noting this Steam release only contains the C64 version, as the TRS-80 and Dragon 32 versions are missing from this release.
